pages.title: Nature's Ritual
pages.text: An advanced transmutation performed at a central table with four salted braziers and nearby mature crops. More complex than Celestial Infusion, but enables powerful transformations.

pages.title: Ritual Table
pages.text: Place at the center of the layout. Insert the $(thing)base item$() here, then activate with a $(l:hexalia:content/tools#hex_focus)Hex Focus$(/l). Removing items during the ritual cancels it.

pages.title: Ritual Braziers
pages.text: Place four braziers exactly 2 blocks north, south, east, and west of the table. Load each with the required ingredient, then consecrate with $(l:hexalia:resources/salt#salt)Salt$(/l).

pages.title: Requirements
pages.text: $(li)1 $(l:hexalia:core_mechanics/natures_ritual#table)Ritual Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)4 $(l:hexalia:core_mechanics/natures_ritual#braziers)Ritual Braziers$(/l) at 2 blocks (N/S/E/W).$(br)$(li)$(l:hexalia:content/tools#hex_focus)Hex Focus$(/l) to activate.$(br)$(li)$(l:hexalia:resources/salt#salt)Salt$(/l) on each brazier.$(br)$(li)At least $(bold)8 fully grown crops$() within ~8 blocks.

pages.title: Layout & Setup
pages.text: $(li)Place the table.$(br)$(li)Place braziers 2 blocks away in cardinal directions.$(br)$(li)Load the braziers with the ritual ingredients.$(br)$(li)Right-click each brazier with Salt to consecrate it (visual cue shows when salted).

pages.title: Performing the Ritual
pages.text: $(li)Right-click the table with the base item to load it.$(br)$(li)Verify crops: at least 8 fully grown in range.$(br)$(li)Activate by right-clicking the table with a $(l:hexalia:content/tools#hex_focus)Hex Focus$(/l).

pages.title: During & Completion
pages.text: Duration ~8s. Particle streams flow from each brazier; ingredients and Salt are consumed as theyâ€™re absorbed. On success, the base item transforms, and $(bold)all mature crops revert to seedlings$(). Leafy particles and a completion sound signal success.

pages.title: Failure & Tips
pages.text: $(bold)Fails if$(): any brazier lacks Salt, wrong ingredient combo, fewer than 8 mature crops, or you remove items mid-ritual. Failure emits smoke and an error message.$(br2)$(li)Pre-load braziers and keep spare Salt.$(br)$(li)Build near farms to replenish crop cost quickly.
